text: Pritchey o tekh, kotoryye raskhoduyut svoye imushchestvo, chtoby sniskat' dovol'stvo Allakha i ukrepit' sebya, yavlyayetsya pritcha o sade na kholme. Yesli yego orosit liven', on prinosit plody vdvoyne. Yesli zhe yego ne orosit liven', to yemu byvayet dostatochno morosyashchego dozhdya. Allakh vidit to, chto vy sovershayete
